Steam Auth is a basic application to easily display one time codes [TOTP] via a .maFile from the official Steam app or other 3rd party apps.

 This application nor the author is NOT affiliated with Steamâ„¢ in any way.

 This application is to be used at your own risk! It does contain sensitive information to your steam account if allowed to import a .maFile.

 The application is under the MIT license, complying with functions sampled from other apps.

 Your .maFile should be backed up securely and safely via your own means. It contains your Revocation code to disable Steam Authenticator officially through Steam.

 This application only requires Read Storage permissions. Used only for the dialog file picker.

 Press OK to continue
 Press EXIT to close the application.
